choices.name: Monthly_Relative
choices.choiceText: Relative (eg. "On the first Monday of every 1 month")

choices.name: Yearly_Relative
choices.choiceText: Relative (eg. "On the first Wednesday of June")

formulas.name: latestEndDateWeeklyDayOfWeek
formulas.expression: IF(CONTAINS({!Weekly_Day_of_Week}, "Saturday"), 1, IF(CONTAINS({!Weekly_Day_of_Week}, "Friday"), 2, IF(CONTAINS({!Weekly_Day_of_Week}, "Thursday"), 3, IF(CONTAINS({!Weekly_Day_of_Week}, "Wednesday"), 4, IF(CONTAINS({!Weekly_Day_of_Week}, "Tuesday"), 5, IF(CONTAINS({!Weekly_Day_of_Week}, "Monday"), 6, IF(CONTAINS({!Weekly_Day_of_Week}, "Sunday"), 7, 0)))))))

formulas.name: latestEndDateWeeklyMask
formulas.expression: IF(CONTAINS({!Weekly_Day_of_Week}, "Sunday"), 1, 0) + IF(CONTAINS({!Weekly_Day_of_Week}, "Monday"), 1, 0) + IF(CONTAINS({!Weekly_Day_of_Week}, "Tuesday"), 1, 0) + IF(CONTAINS({!Weekly_Day_of_Week}, "Wednesday"), 1, 0) + IF(CONTAINS({!Weekly_Day_of_Week}, "Thursday"), 1, 0) + IF(CONTAINS({!Weekly_Day_of_Week}, "Friday"), 1, 0) + IF(CONTAINS({!Weekly_Day_of_Week}, "Saturday"), 1, 0)

formulas.name: Monthly_Mask_Calculation
formulas.expression: IF({!Monthly_Day_of_Week} = "Sunday", 1, IF({!Monthly_Day_of_Week} = "Monday", 2, IF({!Monthly_Day_of_Week} = "Tuesday", 4, IF({!Monthly_Day_of_Week} = "Wednesday", 8, IF({!Monthly_Day_of_Week} = "Thursday", 16, IF({!Monthly_Day_of_Week} = "Friday", 32, IF({!Monthly_Day_of_Week} = "Saturday", 64, null)))))))

formulas.name: RecurrenceDayOfWeekMask
formulas.expression: IF({!Daily_Recurrence} = "Every weekday", 62, IF({!Frequency} = "Weekly", {!Weekly_Mask_Calculation}, IF({!Monthly_Recurrence} = {!Monthly_Relative}, {!Monthly_Mask_Calculation}, IF({!Yearly_Recurrence} = {!Yearly_Relative}, {!Yearly_Mask_Calculation}, null))))

formulas.name: RecurrenceType
formulas.expression: IF({!Daily_Recurrence} = {!Every_Weekday}, "RecursEveryWeekday", IF({!Frequency} = "Daily", "RecursDaily", IF({!Frequency} = "Weekly", "RecursWeekly", IF({!Monthly_Recurrence} = {!Monthly_Specific}, "RecursMonthly", IF({!Monthly_Recurrence} = {!Monthly_Relative}, "RecursMonthlyNth", IF({!Yearly_Recurrence} = {!Yearly_Specific}, "RecursYearly", IF({!Yearly_Recurrence} = {!Yearly_Relative}, "RecursYearlyNth", null)))))))

formulas.name: Weekly_Mask_Calculation
formulas.expression: IF(CONTAINS({!Weekly_Day_of_Week}, "Sunday"), 1, 0) + IF(CONTAINS({!Weekly_Day_of_Week}, "Monday"), 2, 0) + IF(CONTAINS({!Weekly_Day_of_Week}, "Tuesday"), 4, 0) + IF(CONTAINS({!Weekly_Day_of_Week}, "Wednesday"), 8, 0) + IF(CONTAINS({!Weekly_Day_of_Week}, "Thursday"), 16, 0) + IF(CONTAINS({!Weekly_Day_of_Week}, "Friday"), 32, 0) + IF(CONTAINS({!Weekly_Day_of_Week}, "Saturday"), 64, 0)

formulas.name: Yearly_Mask_Calculation
formulas.expression: IF({!Yearly_Day_of_Week} = "Sunday", 1, IF({!Yearly_Day_of_Week} = "Monday", 2, IF({!Yearly_Day_of_Week} = "Tuesday", 4, IF({!Yearly_Day_of_Week} = "Wednesday", 8, IF({!Yearly_Day_of_Week} = "Thursday", 16, IF({!Yearly_Day_of_Week} = "Friday", 32, IF({!Yearly_Day_of_Week} = "Saturday", 64, null)))))))

value.stringValue: Long term medication ending today, reassess and extend if needed.

fields.name: Error_Text
fields.fieldText:
There was an error creating the record. Please contact your administrator for more information.


{!$Flow.FaultMessage}
